data.actual_result: There appears a visual bug saying that you purchased the Discord Nitro and a text appearing that the code was used.
data.expected_result: To appear a visual bug saying that you purchased the Discord Nitro and a text appearing that the code was used.
data.short_description: Ok so, this glitch makes a visual bug on your screen saying that you've purchased Discord Nitro.
data.steps_to_repro: - Second click on the activate code button - Third type a used code - Fourth click accept and fastly after that click X(enter + the X button from the activate code window) - Fifth repeat this some times until you get the visual bug done(it could take a bit of tries not many)
